solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int countDigitOne(int n) {--newline--        int ones = 0, m = 1, r = 1;--newline--        while (n > 0) {--newline--            ones += (n + 8) / 10 * m + (n % 10 == 1 ? r : 0);--newline--            r += n % 10 * m;--newline--            m *= 10;--newline--            n /= 10;--newline--        }--newline--        return ones;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
